name: sourcify-4byte
description: Standalone service exposing Sourcify signature database endpoints

scripts.postgres-test:migrate: export DATABASE_URL=postgres://fourbytes:fourbytes@${FOURBYTES_POSTGRES_HOST:-fourbytes-db}:${FOURBYTES_POSTGRES_PORT:-5432}/fourbytes_test_db?sslmode=disable && export DBMATE_MIGRATIONS_DIR=./test/migrations && npx dbmate --no-dump-schema up
scripts.test: npm run postgres-test:migrate & npx c8 --reporter=none mocha test/unit/**/*.spec.ts test/integration/4byte-api.spec.ts
scripts.test-local: npm run postgres-test:start && sleep 3 && FOURBYTES_POSTGRES_HOST=localhost FOURBYTES_POSTGRES_PORT=5433 npm run postgres-test:migrate && FOURBYTES_POSTGRES_HOST=localhost FOURBYTES_POSTGRES_PORT=5433 npm run test; status=$?; npm run postgres-test:stop; exit $status
scripts.cov: run-s -c build test-local cov:html cov:lcov && open-cli coverage/index.html
